title: General information
data: Here you can enter a description of your Portal for users.

title: Terms & Conditions
data: Here you should put the content of the Terms & Conditions of your Portal.

title: Release notes
data: Here you can post updates regarding changes to the next published versions of your Portal. To hide this page, disable it in menu management.

title: Help desk
data: Here you can place help materials, such as FAQs, to make it easier for users to use your Portal. To hide this page, disable it in menu management.

title: Documentation
data: Here you can share documents related to your organization's work with users. To hide this page, disable it in menu management.

title: Tutorials
data: Here you can post tutorials showing examples of how to use your Portal. To hide this page, disable it in menu management.
